Street Cameras Installation

Sep. 2019 - Dec. 2019

- Designed a system to help police department with the installation of security cameras at traffic intersections, which supports adding/changing/removing streets operation and finally generates the location and minimum number of cameras should be installed, using multiprocessing to drive all parts working in order in C++ and advanced Linux programming.

- Contributed to user-friendly interface building error-tolerant system and accomplished system efficiency and correctness test as measured by designing random qualified streets generation system.

- Optimized the performance on complicated case as decreasing running time sharply and reaching 90% accuracy by developing the algorithm to trade off time complexity and approximation ratio.
